attributes.action: Debate the revoking of Uber's licence to operate in London
attributes.additional_details: Londoners have lost out, competitive pressure is eliminated and drink driving is likely to increase due to the inefficiency of other services. This is not even to mention the 40,000 Uber drivers out of work!
attributes.background: I am shocked by the decision by Tfl to revoke the Uber license; indeed, it is a Luddite decision. It is a fast, cheap and efficient service for Londoners and other cab services simply cannot compete.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. This is the responsibility of the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
